Package Inventory

Interface PendingManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
InventoryManagement, PrescriptionManagement
public interface PendingManagement
The PendingManagement interface defines methods for managing items with a pending status.

This interface includes methods to view all items marked as pending and to process these items for approval. Implementations of this interface should handle updates to item status and log details of the approval process.

Since:
2024-11-5
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sia Yi Zhen

  • Method Details

    • viewPendingItems

      void viewPendingItems()
      Displays or retrieves all items that are currently pending approval. Implementing classes should provide a mechanism to display or return the details of each pending item.

    • handleAllPending

      void handleAllPending(String approvedBy)
      Processes and approve all items marked as pending. The method updates each itemâ€™s status to indicate approval and records the ID of the individual who approved the items.
      Parameters:
      approvedBy - The ID of the individual responsible for approving the pending items.
